snippet: Members of the California Reform Party rejected a move by Ross Perot loyalists today to keep Patrick J. Buchanan, the presidential hopeful, off the ballot in the nation's most vote-rich state.    By a show of credentials, Mr. Buchanan's opponents ...
lead_paragraph: Members of the California Reform Party rejected a move by Ross Perot loyalists today to keep Patrick J. Buchanan, the presidential hopeful, off the ballot in the nation's most vote-rich state. By a show of credentials, Mr. Buchanan's opponents joined his supporters to kill a watered-down version of the resolution.
abstract: Members of California Reform Party reject move by Ross Perot loyalists to keep Patrick J Buchanan on presidential ballot in nation's most vote-rich state; photo (M)

headline.main: California Reform Delegates Reject Anti-Buchanan Move
